languageSelectionScreen.title: Let’s get started!
languageSelectionScreen.subTitle: Please select the language for the app.

loginScreen.title: Welcome to AppnaFarm Management
loginScreen.subTitle: Please enter your login information to continue.

signupStep1Screen.title: Create an Account
signupStep1Screen.subTitle: What role do you want to use AppnaFarm as?
signupStep1Screen.roleFarmerSubTitle: Sign up to use our farm management application to automate your farm. This includes everything you need to monitor.
signupStep1Screen.roleInvestorSubTitle: Sign up to see which projects with commercial crops are available for investment. You can invest in a whole farm or just part of a project.
signupStep1Screen.ownerSubTitle: Sign up to utilize our POS to sell your crop, or reserve a harvest in advance by visiting our Appna Store and connect with the community.

signupStep2Screen.title: Create an Account
signupStep2Screen.subTitle: Please fill in your account information.

signupStep3Screen.title: Verify Your Account
signupStep3Screen.subTitle: We have sent you a 6-digit OTP to your phone number {{phoneNumber}}. Use that OTP to verify your account.
signupStep3Screen.otpToastSubTitle: Please check your phone for verification code

signupStep4Screen.title: Verification Successful!
signupStep4Screen.subTitle: Your phone number has been successfully verified. Lastly, please create a new and unique password for your AppnaFarm account.
signupStep4Screen.minPasswordCondition: Password must be more than 8 characters
signupStep4Screen.passwordCondition: Password must be a combination of letters and numbers

appnafarmScreen.viewDetails: Tap on your farm to view its details

addfarmScreen.demoModalDescription: To mark your farm on map. Place the markers on the map for each corners and close the shape to complete the farm area.
addfarmScreen.saveModalDescription: Please confirm if this is the total area of this farm. You can also manually adjust the area for precise measurement.

addFarmDetailsScreen.title: Add Farm Details
addFarmDetailsScreen.typeSubTitle: Select the type of crop for your farm.
addFarmDetailsScreen.detailsSubTitle: Add Sowing details of your farm
addFarmDetailsScreen.farmSavedDescription: Your Farm has been added successfully!
addFarmDetailsScreen.name: Name

accountSuccessScreen.title: Account Created successfully!
accountSuccessScreen.subTitle: One last thing! Now let’s setup your business profile so you can get the most out of AppnaFarm Investment Account.

InvestorSetp1Screen.title: Tell us about your employment
InvestorSetp1Screen.description: In order to make your experience refined, we are required to ask about your employment status.

investorStep2Screen.detail: Please enter your current employment details.
investorStep2Screen.name: Business Name

investorStep3Screen.title: What is your main source of income?
investorStep3Screen.subTitle: Please select the most relevant option.

investorStep4Screen.title: How much do you plan to invest in the next 12 months?
investorStep4Screen.subTitle: Use the slider below to give us your best estimated budget. You can always choose how much to invest per project.
investorStep4Screen.period: Projections based on a 5 year holding period.

profileScreen.investSubTitle: Complete your onboarding to be able to invest in projects.

rewardsScreen.plus: Invest USD 20,000 by Dec 31st, 2023 to reach Plus
rewardsScreen.invite: Invite your friends and you’ll both receive a rewards balance to invest in our projects!

planningStep3Screen.title: Add Plan Details
planningStep3Screen.addpreference: Add your preferences for your plan

planningStep4Screen.title: Add Plan Details
planningStep4Screen.description: Add payment details of your requested plan
planningStep4Screen.label: Payment Method

appnaStoreScreen.title: Appna Store
appnaStoreScreen.label: Get Ready to showcase your products to the market
appnaStoreScreen.description: You can list your produce, inventory and inputs to the market place

addDailyActivityScreen.selectFarm: Select farm(s) to view the record

fertilizationScreen.title: Daily Operations
fertilizationScreen.recordingInputPlaceholder: Describe your fertilization activity (e.g one bag of DAP is distributed in the field
